sentences.sContent: Gerry’s confidence made him feel invulnerable.
sentences.sCn: 自信让格里觉得自己无懈可击。

synos.tran: 无懈可击的；不会受伤害的

remMethod.val: in(不) + vuln(伤害) + erable → 不易被伤害的 → 不会受伤害的

trans.tranCn: 不会受伤害的, 无懈可击的
trans.tranOther: someone or something that is invulnerable cannot be harmed or damaged if you attack or criticize them
